name: Sanctum of Darkness
description:
This is my first game! It's a puzzle game wherein the goal is to collect 3 Books and 3 Gems to win the game, while not being killed by Bombs. This took just slightly over 3 hours to make and isn't the best quality in the world. But enjoy the one level I had time for nonetheless! Will probably update and improve after voting.

Use the number keys 1-9 to select items in your posession.

To safely collect a Bomb: Touch it whilst holding a Ring.

To grapple over a yellow wall: Touch it whilst holding some Rope.

To purchase a Gem: Have 3 Coins in your posession.
